entries.category: The Clone Relics, A fallen hero
entries.journal_entry_description: One of the troopers of the Clone Wars wants revenge for being left to die by his old commander, now a corrupt armsdealer selling imperial military material.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Head to the association hall in Keren on Naboo and talk to an Imperial officer in charge.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You are expected in the basement for an important holo call, probably from some high ranking officer. It seems like the Empire are taking the information about Morkov seriously.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The Emperor has ordered that Morkov disappears, permanently. Search Morkov for logs of his business that will assist the Empire in tracking down traitors within their ranks.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You found Morkov's datapad, return it to Major Raev at the Keren association hall.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Return to Mort in the Dearic cantina on Talus and tell him what happened.
